abstract: YouTube is set to announce a partnership with the BBC to create two entertainment channels and one news channel on YouTube.
snippet: YouTube is set to announce a partnership with the BBC to create two entertainment channels and one news channel on YouTube.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, March 1 — Google has been frustrated in its efforts to reach comprehensive deals with major studios and networks to put their video on YouTube. But in the meantime, it is forming partnerships with hundreds of smaller media companies that see value — or at least a valuable experiment — in contributing to the site.

headline.main: Google Courts Small YouTube Deals, and Very Soon, a Larger One
headline.print_headline: Google Courts Small YouTube Deals, and Very Soon, a Larger One

abstract: Google is forming partnerships with hundreds of smaller media companies that see value in contributing to the site.
snippet: Google is forming partnerships with hundreds of smaller media companies that see value in contributing to the site.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, March 1 — Google has been frustrated in its efforts to reach comprehensive deals with major studios and networks to put their video on YouTube. Meanwhile, it is forming partnerships with hundreds of smaller media companies that see value — or at least a valuable experiment — in contributing to the site.

abstract: Google disclosed in its 2006 annual report on Thursday that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission nearly a year ago had called into question how it accounted for income taxes. In the annual filing, Google said it received a letter from the S.E.C. in March 2006 on various issues and subsequently corresponded with the agency as recently as January 2007. The tax dispute remains unresolved.
lead_paragraph: Google disclosed in its 2006 annual report on Thursday that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission nearly a year ago had called into question how it accounted for income taxes. In the annual filing, Google said it received a letter from the S.E.C. in March 2006 on various issues and subsequently corresponded with the agency as recently as January 2007. The tax dispute remains unresolved.

headline.main: S.E.C. Takes Issue With Google Tax Accounting
